title: Where the big dogs are
author: VD
content_html: Congratulations to the great John Randle, who was honored with a place in Canton yesterday. Every Vikings fan loved the intensity of the face-painted warrior. As for Cris Carter, I don’t see a problem with him having to wait a year or two after Jerry Rice. After all, all he did was catch touchdowns.
content_text:
Congratulations to
the great John Randle
, who was honored with a place in Canton yesterday.  Every Vikings fan loved the intensity of the face-painted warrior.  As for Cris Carter, I don’t see a problem with him having to wait a year or two after Jerry Rice.  After all, all he did was catch touchdowns.
